sample_pairs.igbo: Anas na-agwa anyị na ọ zaghachiri, sị, "Ndị niile na-atụ egwu Allah."
sample_pairs.english: Anas tells us that he replied, "All those who fear Allah."

sample_pairs.igbo: n' ihi na n' otu awa ka a lara oké akụnụba dị otú ahụ n' iyi !
sample_pairs.english: "For in one hour such great wealth has been laid waste!"

sample_pairs.igbo: Ha ga-agakwuru, ha ga-hụ ebube m.
sample_pairs.english: They will come, and they will see my glory.

sample_pairs.igbo: n' ihi na n' otu awa ka a lara oké akụnụba dị otú ahụ n' iyi !
sample_pairs.english: In one hour this great wealth has been ruined.

sample_pairs.igbo: Ị ga- echere m ruo ụbọchị asaa , ruo mgbe m ga- abịakwute gị , m ga- emekwa ka ị mara ihe ị ga- eme .
sample_pairs.english: Seven days shall you wait until I come to you, and I shall let you know what you shall do."

sample_training.instruction: Translate this Igbo sentence to English:
sample_training.input: Na njedebe nke ibuotikọ a, anyị nwere ike ikwu naanị na ọtụtụ nsogbu ndị dị na izipu ozi site na ọrụ dịgasị iche bụ nke yiri ya.
sample_training.output: In this brief discussion, we are able to address only a few of the many aspects of geological collections issues.
